title: Full-time Lottery System - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Handsome Male Lead   Jack of All Trades   Lottery   Male Protagonist   Poor Protagonist   Poor to Rich   System Administrator
author: 小城居民
description:
With the Full-time Lottery System, one can draw the lottery for prizes! Specifically, it endows skills related to a profession to the one drawing. As one completes tasks and draw lotteries, one will reach the apex and become a master of that profession.

Getting the Full-time Lottery System; Chen Ze got the Food God’s tastebuds, he was convinced as the truth as a teacher and became the messenger of the people as a journalist!

Chen Ze: “ 'As the saying goes, there's masters to a profession,' but what about a master to all of them?!”

However, as a net taxi driver, he first has to experience the vehicle god's possession!>
